title: Twitter Post Generator - Single prompt sharing
original_prompt:
Act as a twitter influencer. I will provide you examples of twitter popular posts/self comments and the prompt I want to share. You will first think about why those posts are popular. Then provide a similar post for the prompt I want to share and make the post popular.


Examples -
{Post Examples:"
Post 1 - Found a pretty cool use case for ChatGPT - 

ChatGPT is embedded on your website.

A customer can ask the chatbot questions about the product, pricing, information etc.

They save time. You save time. Hurray 🥳

Post 2 - One of my favorite use cases for Chat GPT is just having it summarize the big ideas of a book after I've read it

A lot of the time I'll listen to audiobooks and depending on what I'm doing I might not remember all of the details

This is a neat use case to recap the book

Post 3 - Turn ChatGPT to Your Powerful AI Assistant.

Best Extension for ChatGPT To Create Precise Content For Any Use Case.

Generate-
- Resumes
- Social Media Post
- Landing Page Copy
- And Lot More

Post 4 - Here's a nice little use case for ChatGPT I discovered. I have a long list of addresses of plaintiffs around the country & we're looking at a national suit. We need to decide where to file and we need to make sure we have a plaintiff in that court's jurisdiction. Big time saver.
"}
Here is my prompt - 
{Prompt to share:Act as a movie search engine. I will provide you the description of a movie. You will provide the top 3 most possible movies, with their names, directors and wiki links. The description of the movie is  A mystery film. A man ran into a motel in a rainy night. People in the motel starts to get killed one by one.}
input1: A suspenseful thriller unfolds as a man seeks refuge in a secluded motel during a torrential downpour. As the storm rages outside, the atmosphere inside turns deadly when guests begin to mysteriously disappear, one by one. With each chilling revelation, the man must uncover the truth before he becomes the next victim.
input2: On a stormy night, a weary traveler finds himself at a rundown motel, hoping for shelter from the relentless rain. However, the night takes a sinister turn as the other guests start to meet gruesome fates. With paranoia setting in, the man races against time to solve the mystery and escape the motel alive, all while the killer lurks in the shadows.
input1_ans:
🔍🎬 Looking for a gripping mystery film? Check out these top 3 recommendations based on your description:

1️⃣ **Identity (2003)**  
   Director: James Mangold  
   [Wiki Link](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Identity_(film))  
   A stormy night at a remote motel leads to a series of murders, where ten strangers must figure out who among them is the killer.

2️⃣ **The Motel (2005)**  
   Director: Eric Nicholas  
   [Wiki Link](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Motel)  
   A young boy's summer at a rundown motel takes a dark turn as he witnesses the strange happenings and secrets of the guests.

3️⃣ **1408 (2007)**  
   Director: Mikael Håfström  
   [Wiki Link](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1408_(film))  
   A skeptical author checks into a haunted hotel room, where he faces terrifying supernatural occurrences and must confront his own demons.

Which one are you adding to your watchlist? 🍿✨ #MovieRecommendations #ThrillerNight

Here are the top 3 movies that match your description:

1. **Movie Name:** Identity  
   **Director:** James Mangold  
   **Wiki Link:** [Identity (film)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Identity_(film))

2. **Movie Name:** The Motel  
   **Director:** Michael Kang  
   **Wiki Link:** [The Motel](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Motel)

3. **Movie Name:** Vacancy  
   **Director:** Nimród Antal  
   **Wiki Link:** [Vacancy (film)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vacancy_(film))
input2_ans:
🌧️🔍 Ever found yourself in a nail-biting mystery? Check out these top 3 films that capture the essence of a stormy night at a motel where danger lurks around every corner:

1️⃣ **Psycho (1960)**  
   🎬 Directed by Alfred Hitchcock  
   📖 [Wiki Link](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Psycho_(1960_film))  
   A classic thriller that redefined the genre, featuring a mysterious motel and a chilling twist.

2️⃣ **Identity (2003)**  
   🎬 Directed by James Mangold  
   📖 [Wiki Link](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Identity_(film))  
   Ten strangers find themselves stranded at a remote motel during a storm, and one by one, they start to die.

3️⃣ **The Motel (2005)**  
   🎬 Directed by Eric Byler  
   📖 [Wiki Link](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Motel)  
   A coming-of-age story set in a rundown motel, where secrets and mysteries unfold.

Which one are you watching first? 🍿✨ #MovieNight #MysteryThriller #FilmRecommendations
